title: Offset buys the Titanic heart diamond ring for Cardi B's 27th birthday
text:
Offset spent all the money on his wife Cardi B to celebrate her 27th birthday (Picture: Getty Images)

There’s nothing rapper Offset loves more than to see his wife Cardi B rocking the flashiest bling possible.

So it comes as no surprise that the Migos star chose to gift his baby mother with two ridiculously huge diamond rings to celebrate her 27th birthday.

The pair was at an intimate dinner with friends and family when the rings from Pristine Jewelers werr presented to the Bodak Yellow rapper.

Cardi was overwhelmed and joked that she was close to tears when she got a look at the Titanic heart diamond ring and the accompanying heart diamonds band.

‘Thank you sooo much babe @offsetyrn I can’t believe it Deum @pristine_jewelers ! I’m so happy Soo grateful,’ she captioned a video of the moment.

While fans got a closer look at the rings on Pristine Jeweler’s official Instagram page as they wrote: ‘The TITANIC Diamond @iamcardib @offsetyrn!!!! When it comes to Glaciers… Pristine Jewelers is #1in the World !!! Happy bday @iamcardib enjoy your new ROCK !!!’ the jewelers wrote on Instagram.

In addition to her own gifts, Cardi’s14-month-old daughter Kulture also got some gifts as she was seen with a plethora of gold jewels in a sweet video of the tot dancing along to her parents’ track Clout.

Back in July, the pair celebrated their ‘perfect’ daughter’s first birthday together.

Kulture celebrated her first birthday on 10 July and was treated to a huge birthday party with lavish gifts, which included a toy Rolls Royce to match her parents’ wheels.

Referring to daughter as her ‘birthday girl’, Cardi said she had to wash cake out of Kulture’s hair, as the pair clearly got a little carried away while celebrating.

Offset, meanwhile, couldn’t help gushing over the ‘perfect’ one-year-old in another sweet birthday post.

‘YOU ARE SO PERFECT LOVE YOU KK,’ Offset wrote. ‘HAPPY 1st BDAY I LOVE YOU.’
